Home.pangram: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
Home.greetings_desc: Over 9 years of experience in web development. Building scalable enterprise applications

about_me_text.1: Specializing in the React ecosystem and the development of modern web applications.
about_me_text.2: Experienced in building enterprise systems for a large bank, including interfaces for internal platforms with complex role-based access models used by employees to work with clients, partners, and documents. Involved in application architecture, project git-flow, and maintaining high code quality and consistent styling.
about_me_text.3: Led frontend development on a project: conducted code reviews and technical interviews, mentored junior developers, and maintained project documentation in Confluence.
about_me_text.4: Additionally, experienced in developing Smart TV applications and CMS platforms for managing Digital Signage broadcasts.
